data.name: Half-Life: Alyx - Final Hours "Triage at Dawn" Theme
data.detailed_description: Ursine Vulpine's adaptation of Kelly Bailey's "Triage at Dawn" theme from Half-Life 2 or The Final Hours of Half-Life: Alyx. The complete theme, as heard in the Final Hours trailer and menu, is now available as a stand-alone file.
data.about_the_game: Ursine Vulpine's adaptation of Kelly Bailey's "Triage at Dawn" theme from Half-Life 2 or The Final Hours of Half-Life: Alyx. The complete theme, as heard in the Final Hours trailer and menu, is now available as a stand-alone file.
data.short_description: Ursine Vulpine's adaptation of Kelly Bailey's "Triage at Dawn" theme from Half-Life 2 or The Final Hours of Half-Life: Alyx
